column4: I need to get Google Chrome 18th version. Where/how can I get it?
It is now autoupdated to 19, which is crap for me
I thought Google Chrome updates itself 'undER The hood'
well, I need somehow to browse and get old deb
for this I should know the exact version of the package
which is not the case. For example, current version is called: 19.0.1084.46-r135956
I understand. Sorry can't help you with that.
disaster. They deleted the version I found in logs ( 18.0.1025.168-r134367 ) :((
would you paste a link to the repo you are using for Chrome?
because some malicious bastard made a change which had led to Autosave Extension stopped working from 19 and over
until it start working again. Imagine, you moved all your development to some tool, and then it stopped working
Autosave, to say truth, is saving hours per week, not to say its much more convinient to, keeing editing CSS/JavaScript on your fingertips
I now confirm I see 18th of Chromium in stable. Thank you
huh, feeling much warmer now. Installed Chromium, copied all Chrome personal stuff, things run smooth.
